Windows Vista minidriver is necessary for the ID card to work without glitches in the newer Windows operating systems.

Functionality:
 1. User identification (logging into e-services) in the Internet Explorer browser
 1. E-mail encryption and signing with user identification certificate in Outlook
 1. Automatic registration and de-registration of the certificates in the system
 1. End the session when the card is removed
 1. Log into the operating system with the smartcard
 1. Driver updates through Windows Update
